p: To assess the antigenic relatedness between A (H1N1) pdm09 strains isolated in Kenya and vaccine viruses A/California/7/2009 and A/Michigan/45/2015, hemagglutination-inhibition (HAI) assay was performed using the WHO Collaborating Centre for Reference and Research on Influenza (VIDRL, Melbourne, Australia) HAI typing assay kit, according to the manufacturerâ€™s instructions ( http://www.influenzacentre.org/flucentres_HIassay.htm).
